name: DHL Privatkunden
description: Adds the tracking page of DHL Germany to Ferdi
author: Kai Brune (@kaibrune)

config.message: Saldy the setup is a bit clumsy, so here's an introduction: If you first load up the recipe you will see no parcels. Please login in by hitting the button in the menu bar. Fill in your login details, click on 'Angemeldet bleiben' and close the window, then reload the recipe. Now you're good to go. Have fun!
